query:
SELECT id, businessName,
  CASE WHEN titanRoadmap IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_titan,
  CASE WHEN offerPlaybook IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_offer,
  CASE WHEN facebookAdLaunch IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_facebook,
  CASE WHEN instagramGrowth IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_instagram,
  CASE WHEN leadGeneration IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_leadgen
FROM roadmaps 
WHERE id = 240003;
